title: Czech Republic
description: In July 2017 my wife and I visited a friend who was spending the summer in Prague for his PhD research.

photos.alt: Differently colored storefronts along a street.

photos.description: The Prague Astronomical Clock, one of the oldest functional clocks in the world.
photos.alt: An ornate clock with multiple rings and dials.

photos.description: A bunch of skull candles and other assorted bones in the Sedlec Ossuary.
photos.alt: A chandelier made of human bones with candles resting on skulls.

photos.description: More bones. It was very dark so the camera was struggling.
photos.alt: Skulls and bones arranged decoratively with metal accents.

photos.description: Karl≈°tejn Castle, built by Charles IV in the 14th century.
photos.alt: A large castle on a hill above a small town.

photos.description: A sleepy Czech cat somewhere outside the castle.
photos.alt: A close up view of a cat sleeping on the sidewalk.
